MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.15am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are on site patrolling the overhead line to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.02 am on Tuesday 22nd December 2020.
